page_title_en: Mario Kart Racing Wheel For Switch Gets Big Discount
page_description_en: Play Mario Kart 8 Deluxe in style with this colorful steering wheel controller.
page_text_html:
Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is easily one of the best games to own on a Nintendo Switch, but the best way to play it is with a funky steering wheel. While this particular piece of Hori hardware won't give Logitech any sleepless nights, it does score points for being colorful, easy to assemble, and having all the inputs you'd need for a run down Shy Guy Falls in the Flower Cup.

In addition to the steering wheel that sports Mario's signature blue and red colors, you'll also get a set of pedals for when you want to start drifting around a corner like a pro. On the steering wheel you'll find plenty of buttons, a D-pad, and paddles for convenient onboard controls.

See on Woot

This kit usually goes for $70, but right now on Woot, you can grab it for the low price of $53. As for Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, you can save $20 off of its usual price in Nintendo's early Black Friday deals.

"If you don't own a Wii U or skipped out on Mario Kart 8 the first time around--or even if you've played it before--Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is worth your time," Kallie Plagge wrote in GameSpot's Mario Kart 8 Deluxe review. "It plays beautifully on Switch in both handheld and docked mode, and its core racing is as exciting as ever. And, most notably, it completely revamps the original's lackluster Battle Mode, rounding out an already great racing game."
